title: Helen Keller
description: Helen Keller is a biography about a girl who became deaf and blind at 19 months of age. Readers learn about her relationship with her teacher, how she learned to communicate, and how she went on to defy the odds through perseverance and the help of a dedicated teacher. Photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Braille, communicate, disabilities, frustrated, inspiration, overcome, senses, sign language, survived
